segments.text: I observe the angled view of this domestic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge onto the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the tiled floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinet doors stand open revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a step stool to access the upper shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture suggests he's retrieving something from inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, extending her hand expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a glimpse of an orderly garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the stool looks unstableâ€” that could be trouble!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water everywhere adds to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this setup.
segments.speaker: PAR
